channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Slideshow Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Slideshow Gallery

item.title: CVE-2021-24882|2024-08-03T19:49:13.943Z -- unknown -- slideshow%20gallery
item.description: The Slideshow Gallery WordPress plugin before 1.7.4 does not sanitise and escape the Slide "Title", "Description", and Gallery "Title" fields, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html is disallowed
